meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: To remember this reading, just think about what your mommy did for you when you were little and you got yourself a <vocabulary>wound</vocabulary>... she would <reading>kiss</reading> (きず) the wounds better. Of course, that never worked and was a total farce, but try to forgive mommy this one time, okay?
